short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick, accurate and aesthetically pleasing way to know your internet speed & status

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This cool extension provides a quick, accurate and aesthetically pleasing way to know your internet speed & status.
It tracks the real-time status and speed of a user’s internet connectivity, and it updates the user’s view with an increase or decrease in the spinning fan which is controlled by how fast your internet connection is, in a split second this immediately informs the user of their internet speed and status; it also provides additional basic information on the user’s internet connection, e.g the user’s network type like 5g.

FEATURES:
- Displays internet connection status and updates when connected or 
  disconnected.
- Displays internet connectivity speed with a cool visual of a spinning fan 
  which increases by speed based on your internet connection speed.
- Displays internet connectivity speed in mbps 
- Displays network type (e.g 5g)
